sect1.title: Installing Libtool-&libtool-version;
sect1.para: The Libtool package contains the GNU generic library support script. It wraps the complexity of using shared libraries in a consistent, portable interface.
For its installation Libtool depends on: Bash, Binutils, Coreutils, Diffutils, GCC, Glibc, Grep, Make, Sed.

sect2.title: Installation of Libtool
sect2.para: To have the results tested, issue: make check.

sect2.title: Short descriptions
sect2.para: libtool provides generalized library-building support services.
libtoolize provides a standard way to add libtool support to a package.
libltdl hides the various difficulties of dlopening libraries.
